::Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

The two males stop frowning at each other and look at Desmonus as she 
makes her suggestion, both of them changing course toward another 
hallway.

"A drink's good," Bloodystrike says, Reptilica cutting in to say that 
he knew one she might like. Bloodystrike growls at Reptilica, 
managing to shut him up for the time being.

"I'd be glad to get aquainted with you," Bloodystrike says, pulling 
Desmonus toward him. Noticing the pull, Reptilica retaliates by 
pulling her toward himself.

"Bloodystrike isn't too interesting a bot," Reptilica says, getting a 
growl from Bloodystrike, "You could have a drink with me instead.."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Desmonus notices the frowns on both of the males faces as they 
notice that 
> she was holding both of their hands, probably each just wanting her 
for 
> themselves. Men, always greedy.
> But she could use this fact as well, probably eating her fill 
without really 
> harming either of them...they'de just need a napp for a while.
> 
> At first she just thought that Bloodystrike was just going to show 
her his 
> quarters, probably wanting to brage about them. But then she clued 
in, and 
> narrowed her optics a bit.
> So, that was what they were both after? Well, she could play this 
game 
> too...making the suffer and wait just a while longer before she fed.
> 
> Then noticing the Reptilica also wanted to show her his quarters as 
well, 
> but restraining against both of them the best she could without 
being 
> obviouse.
> Though...it was a bit useless, being dragged down the hall by both 
males, 
> each in hope to probably get her to themselves and alone so that 
they can 
> eventually pull off what they had in mind for her.
> But that sort of thing barely even made her care, being such a 
simple thing 
> that beings such as these could be pleased with.
> Simple pleasures for simple minds.
> Feeding upon her pray was where she got her pleasure from, but that 
would 
> all come in time.
> 
> However, their arguing was getting tirsome, and she was actually 
beginning 
> to get tired of it.*
> 
> " Hmm...maybe a tour isn't best viewed on an empty 
stomach...perhaps a hot 
> drink would be nice...get to know my fellow bots..."
> 
> * She gave each of their hands an extra squeeze.*
